EmailTemplate.subject: Stop Settling for Unreliable In-Flight Wi-Fi
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
Take Advantage of Tax Incentives and Upgrade to JetWave
Honeywell’s JetWave™ gives you the best Wi-Fi experience in the air. JetWave lets you download huge files, videoconference with colleagues or customers, and video chat with friends and family – on the tarmac or at 25,000 feet. Only JetWave gives you an onboard Wi-Fi experience that is as good as you get at home or the office.
Recent changes to U.S. tax rules that allow you to write off up to 100% of equipment purchases for business aircraft, including JetWave. The revised code means now is the perfect time to add Honeywell's JetWave high-speed Wi-fi to make your flight time more productive.
Treat yourself to more reliable in-flight Wi-Fi this holiday season. Schedule your upgrade with StandardAero today.
UPGRADE TO JETWAVE NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/StandardAero_JetWave_Oct_2018.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=18_channelamericas_commercial]]>
